snippet.title: compactMap and flatMap: Clean Up Optionals and Crashes!
snippet.description:
Both of these functions are super useful for reducing the nil checking in your programs.  In this lesson I'll go over a couple of examples as to how and when to effectively integrate these functions into the logic of your applications.  Enjoy.

AppStore JSON APIs
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/AppStore-JSON-APIs

Tinder Firestore Swipe and Match
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Tinder-Firestore-Swipe-and-Match

Twitter Slide Out Menu Course
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Twitter-Slide-Out-Menu

Podcasts Course
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Podcasts

Intermediate Training Core Data
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/intermediate-training-core-data

Instagram Firebase Course
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/instagram-firebase

https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course_video?id=4932
